data.actual_result: The edited message will appear twice, once without the strikethrough and the proper edited form right next to it (For the previous example: *example~~example~~*) - Note that the message itself is properly stored on the server and it is being displayed normally on other devices, this is a local client bug
data.expected_result: The message is edited properly and the client shows the edited message normally
data.short_description: Editing a message with bad strikethrough and another formatting to its correct format will mess the shown message
data.steps_to_repro: - Send a message with strikethrough and at least one other formatting with a \` character on the strikethrough instead of \~ (\~\`\*example\*\~\~) - Edit the message and replace the \` character with the \~ character to produce normal strikethrough
